settings.editor: We are a team passionate about capturing the perfect shot. We are committed to delivering the best results for our clients by being attentive to all their needs and adopting a detail-oriented and professional approach.

settings.title: THE NEW LEVEL OF DRONE AERIAL PHOTO AND VIDEO

price_list.title: Up to 40 Minutes of Flight Time
price_list.item_description: The Freefly Star8 multi-rotor unpacks, ready to shoot, in under 5 minutes. It is easy to fly in our hands, powerful, rigid, adaptable and reliable, and is a UAV optimized for up to 15-pound payloads.

slides.content: Airborne Works was very good to work with. They were really detailed and arrived on time. The drone was quality work and we would definitely hire them again!
